caption.body: NOW PLAYING: Colorful line drawings morph from one posture to another in this animated short, which was created by filmmaker Alex Moy as an exercise to find perspective and embrace change during a particularly anxious period after graduating from film school.  See "Idle, Torrent" by Alex Moy, now playing in the Video Arts Room located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2Ys4yBI
